title: WA Robot Workflow Abort Response
description: Schema for the data field when calling 'wa robot workflow abort <execution_id>'. Aborts a running workflow.

execution_id.description: The execution ID that was targeted

aborted.description: Whether the workflow was successfully aborted

workflow_name.description: Name of the workflow that was aborted

aborted_at.description: Unix timestamp (ms) when abort was recorded

error_reason.description: Why the abort failed (present when aborted=false)
